Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-4323 affecting package fluent-bit for versions less than 3.0.6-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-4323 affecting package fluent-bit for versions less than 3.0.6-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package fluent-bit is earlier than 3.0.6-1, affected by CVE-2024-4323
